import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './Covid.css' const Covid = () => { const getCovidData = async() =>{ const response = fetch('https://data.covid19india.org/data.json') console.log(response); } useState(()=>{ getCovidData(); }) return ( <>

Covid 19 Tracker

  • Our Country

    India

  • Total Recovered

    {data.recovered}

  • Total Confirmed

    {data.confirmed}

  • Total Deaths

    {data.deaths}

  • Total Active

    {data.active}

  • Last UpdateTime

    {data.lastupdatedtime}

) } export default Covid
